snippet: Friday’s selections from around the Web include the story of a cryptographer who is too much of a crank to be invited to cool security parties but not cranky enough for the National Security Agency. Plus, an essay from a well-known security expert...
abstract: Friday’s selections from around the Web include the story of a cryptographer who is too much of a crank to be invited to cool security parties but not cranky enough for the National Security Agency. Plus, an essay from a well-known security expert on why engineers need to reclaim the Internet from government snoops.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Cranky Cryptographer and Taking the Internet Back
